entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is injured and in need of help. He is described as stretching out his arms to Harry with a look of supplication.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who catches Dobby and tries to save him from dying.

relationships.description: Dobby stretches out his arms to Harry, indicating that he needs help. Harry catches Dobby and tries to save him from dying.
